title: The Right Track
brief_description: A safety film dedicated to teaching youngsters of the need for safety precautions in the vicinity of railroad tracks, property and and yards. Trains fascinate children, but rail tracks are a most dangerous playground. Sponsored by the Association of American Railroads.
